Чтобы понять сюжет данной игры, нужно пройти 1 часть. Но оно того стоит, сюжет просто прекрасен, тут есть неожиданные повороты и хватает грустных моментов. Интересный гемплей. Хорошая графика для того времени. 
Рекомендую данную игру, обязательно купите её и дополнения к ней.
很经典的游戏。不管是战斗，剧情还是氛围的描述上都很好。 跟强作水下世界相比，天空之城更让人感觉美好。最主要的是伊丽莎白的塑造和ai系统的完善，让你不会感觉到孤单寂寞。真棒！
The best
still one of the best game ive played up till this date. if youre thinking about getting it, get it now! its on sale. buy first regret later
Не дрысня
Una alucinante obra maestra, sin duda sera una de esas joyas que quedaran grabadas en la historia 10/10
Still fun I need more Bioshock :o

"...It's like a wheel of blood, spinning round and round."
― Elizabeth, 1958.
这不仅仅是个游戏，更是我梦想中的一个世界。
This game was just mindblowing, Can't wait to play again with harder difficult. :]

Jogo lindo, com historia muito marcante e jogabilidade bem agradável.
O jogo é bem diferente dos seus antecessores, perdendo até o clima de terror. Mas a história e jogabilidade deixam isso de lado.
Vale cada centavo!
生化奇兵，我在steam上打通的第一款游戏。这款游戏虽然有点老，但是是一款经得起时间考验的游戏。而且这款游戏的每一个场景都能截屏当壁纸。ps:伊丽莎白好漂亮！

When I picked up this game on a random sale, I was anticipating that it would be good because of reviews I had read before. What I wasn't expecting was a game that I couldn't put down until I had beaten the main story. The characters were riveting, the story was paced well, and the ending left me satisfied. It was a very complete single player experience that was thought provoking and fresh. Can't say anything about the replay value because I have moved on to other titles, but I really enjoyed my time with this game.
СОТРИТЕ МНЕ ПАМЯТЬ, Я ХОЧУ ЕЩЕ РАЗ
Excelente historia.

Das Spiel ist genial! Weniger das Gameplay an sind, welches eher ein 0815 Shooter ist, sondern das Setting, die Inszenierung, das Artwork und vor allem die Geschichte. Es hat mit eines der besten Enden der Spielegeschichten. Die letzten 30 Minuten sitzt man nur noch mit offenem Mund vor dem Monitor...
มันเป็นปรมัตถ์

" Bioshock Infinite不只是一個關於平行世界的科幻遊戲
　　它是一則關於寬恕、懺悔和救贖的寓言 " - By spiritseed
無限之城的背景設定在 1912 年的美國，在一個漂浮在天空的城市－Columbia。主角 Booker DeWitt 的目標是前往 Columbia 解救一名女孩。「Bring us the girl and wipe away the debt.」，從遊戲開頭就出現的話－把女孩帶來，還清你的債。天空之城 Columbia 是一個被自稱「先知」的 Zachary Hale Comstock 統治，進入城市就會發現他被當成神一樣的崇拜。一路過關殺敵也遇到了任務目標－Elizabeth，一個有超能力，黑頭髮藍眼睛的可愛女孩。她的超能力是類似開啟傳送門（Tear），將其他「世界」內的物件帶入目前世界。隨著遊戲劇情發展，兩人為了達成目標也進入了其他的「世界」，後來了解其為另一個「時間線」。整個遊戲劇情變得更複雜、有趣。
Excellent End to the Series. This game almost is good just on its own without the other two.
久经考验，历久弥新，经典就是经典！

This game is absolutely so awesome. I played the original game without dlc. Then I just counldn't get my hands off the game once I was attracted by the story. So I literally played the game from 2 to 12. Very addicative. And ENTIRELY suprised by the ending, which is the most philosophical ending I have ever seen in a game. 10/10 recommended.
This game is just awesome and everybody should've played it

O jogo mais belíssimo que tive o enorme prazer de jogar. É o exemplo essencial de que videogames SÃO Arte, com A maiúsculo. Estupendo, sensacional, fabuloso. Enredo, personagens, cenários, trilha sonora, TUDO é perfeito. Na minha opinião, ele ser o mais linear de todos os Bioshocks nem mesmo chega a ser um problema quando se tem tantas qualidades. Faça um favor a você mesmo e compre AGORA MESMO! 11/10.
